Cell.Data: The DEV TEAM / MISC NOTES column contains info on what text between { } signs means (if applicable). It usually stands for either a numeric value, or a numeric value with an icon. Text between [ ] signs stands for a certain type of icon.
Psi, as in short for Psionic
Fire a long-range Psionic damage shot.
发射远距离灵能伤害子弹。
Fire a quick snap shot, dealing reduced Psionic damage.
快速发射子弹，造成较弱的灵能伤害。

Channeling their Psionic powers, this unit teleports themselves, spreading a cloud of obscuring smoke in a 1 hex radius around the target hex's location. Units inside that area are {ObscuredPercentage} harder to hit.
该单位引导灵能之力进行传送，在目标单元格地点周围 1 个单元格范围内散播迷盲烟幕，位于烟雾中的单位命中难度增加 {ObscuredPercentage}。
Should 1 in '1 hex radius' be string inserted?

Evoke this unit's haunted past in the mind of target enemy unit. This has a {VisionsMadChance} strength chance to apply [abilityred]Insane[/abilityred] to the unit for {duration}[turn/].[br/]If this fails, the unit receives [abilityred]Broken Mind[/abilityred].
在目标敌方单位脑海中唤起挥之不去的心魔，有 {VisionsMadChance} 力量几率向目标单位施加[abilityred]错乱[/abilityred]。[br/]如果失败，目标单位受到[abilityred]破碎心灵[/abilityred]。
Grants all friendly units {GuidingAccuracy} accuracy and +{GuidingRange} maximum and optimal range for {GuidingTurns}.
所有友方单位获得 {GuidingAccuracy} 准度和 +{GuidingRange} 最大和最佳射程，持续 {GuidingTurns}。
Attacks have {GuidingAccuracy} more accuracy and +{GuidingRange} maximum and optimal range.
攻击获得额外 {GuidingAccuracy} 准度以及 +{GuidingRange} 最大和最佳射程。
All friendly units receive {PsionicHarmonyDamage} additional damage for {PsionicHarmonyTurns}.
所有友方单位额外造成 {PsionicHarmonyDamage} 伤害，持续 {PsionicHarmonyTurns}。
Send forth a wave of madness in a cone, dealing Psionic damage.
向一个扇形区域发射一道狂暴波，造成灵能伤害。
Psionic attacks from this unit leave a debuff on their target, making that unit {accdown} easier to hit.[br/]Psionic buffs from this unit now make friendly units {accup} harder to hit.
该单位造成的灵能攻击会在目标身上留下一个减益，使目标单位的命中难度降低 {accdown}。[br/]来自该单位的灵能增益现在可以让友方单位的命中难度增加 {accup}。
This unit is {ClarityDebuffAccuracy} easier to hit.
该单位的命中难度降低 {ClarityDebuffAccuracy}。
Targeted units become {ClarityHitChance} easier to hit for {ClarityTurn}.
目标单位的命中难度降低 {ClarityHitChance}，持续 {ClarityTurn}。
This unit is {ClarityBuffAccuracy} harder to hit.
该单位的命中难度增加 {ClarityBuffAccuracy}。
Targeted units become {ClarityBuffAccuracy} harder to hit for {ClarityBuffDuration}.
目标单位的命中难度增加 {ClarityBuffAccuracy}，持续 {ClarityBuffDuration}。
Psionic attacks leave a debuff that makes enemy units {ClarityDebuffAccuracy} easier to hit. Psionic buffs apply a debuff that makes friendly units {ClarityBuffAccuracy} harder to hit.
灵能攻击留下的减益使敌方单位的命中难度降低 {ClarityDebuffAccuracy}。灵能增益会施加一个减益效果，使得友方单位的命中难度增加 {ClarityBuffAccuracy}。
Psionic buffs now also heal units for {LifeHealAmount} and grant them {LifeShields} for {Lifeturns}. This can stack.
灵能增益现在能够治疗单位 {LifeHealAmount} 并赋予单位 {LifeShields}，持续 {Lifeturns}。可叠加。
Targeted units heal {LifeHealAmount} and gain {LifeShields} for {Lifeturns}.
目标单位获得 {LifeHealAmount} 治疗并获得 {LifeShields}，持续 {Lifeturns}。
该单位拥有 {LifeTempShields} 临时护盾。

Psionic attacks are empowered with flame, dealing Thermal damage and have a 12[strengththermal/] strength chance (8[strengththermal/] for repeating attacks) to apply [abilityred]Burning[/abilityred].[br/]Psionic buffs increase Thermal Resistance by 6[DefenseThermal/].[br/][br/][productioncol]Only one Focus mod can be active at a time.[/productioncol]
灵能攻击经过烈焰强化，造成热能伤害并有 12[strengththermal/] 力量几率（重复攻击有 8[strengththermal/] 几率）施加[abilityred]燃烧[/abilityred]。[br/]灵能增益提升 6[DefenseThermal/] 热能抵抗。[br/][br/][productioncol]一次只能激活一个专注模块。[/productioncol]
This unit has {FlamesResistBonus} additional Thermal resistance.
该单位拥有额外 {FlamesResistBonus} 热能抵抗。
Target units gain {FlamesResistance} Thermal resistance for {FlamesTurn}.
目标单位获得 {FlamesResistance} 热能抵抗，持续 {FlamesTurn}。

Psionic attacks are infused with acid, dealing Biochemical damage and have a 12[strengthbio/] strength chance (8[strengthbio/] for repeating attacks) to apply [abilityred]Poison[/abilityred].[br/]Psychic buffs increase Biochemical resistance by 6[DefenseBio/].[br/][br/][productioncol]Only one Focus mod can be active at a time.[/productioncol]
灵能攻击中注入了酸液，造成生化伤害并拥有 12[strengthbio/] 力量几率（重复攻击有 8[strengthbio/] 几率）施加[abilityred]中毒[/abilityred]。[br/]灵能增益提升 6[DefenseBio/] 生化抵抗。[br/][br/][productioncol]一次只能激活一个专注模块。[/productioncol]
This unit has {VenomResistBonus} additional Biochemical resistance.
该单位拥有额外 {VenomResistBonus} 生化抵抗。
Target units gain {VenomResistance} Biochemical resistance for {VenomTurn}.
目标单位获得 {VenomResistance} 生化抵抗，持续 {VenomTurn}。
All Psionic attacks have {AetherAccuracyIncrease} increased accuracy.
所有灵能攻击的准度提升 {AetherAccuracyIncrease}。

Through Psionic will of the caster, target unit has a {PsiStrengthChance} strength chance to be Mind Controlled. Mind Controlled units switch factions to your side. The Mind Control effect is canceled if the caster is killed.
施放者通过灵能意志使目标单位有 {PsiStrengthChance} 的力量几率被心灵控制，被心灵控制的单位会加入你的阵营。如果施放者被击杀，心灵控制效果就会消失。
Channel the power of the aether through this unit. Teleport to target location and strike all foes within {radius} hexes.[br/]This unit enters its [abilityblue]Defense Mode[/abilityblue] afterwards.
引导以太之力穿过该单位，传送至目标地点并攻击 {radius} 个单元格范围内的所有敌人。[br/]该单位随后进入[abilityblue]防御模式[/abilityblue]。
A long-range Psionic attack that deals heavy damage in a {hexrad} hex radius.
远程灵能攻击，能够对 {hexrad} 个单元格范围造成大量伤害。
A short-range cone attack that deals Psionic damage to all units.
近程扇形攻击，能够对所有单位造成灵能伤害。
Heals a friendly unit for {HealAmount} and grants them a {MoraleBoost} bonus to Morale.
治疗友方单位 {HealAmount} 并给予 {MoraleBoost} 士气加成。
This unit channels their intense hatred for the target, dealing Psionic damage.
该单位引导对目标的强烈恨意，造成灵能伤害。
Channels Psionic energies to mend target friendly unit, healing them for {MendinghealthRecovered}.[br/]Doesn't work on Mechanical units.
引导灵能能量修补目标友方单位并治疗 {MendinghealthRecovered}。[br/]对机械单位无效。

This unit links itself to the target friendly unit. Any damage dealt to the linked unit is reduced by {absorbPainDamageReduction} and is dealt to this unit instead. This effect lasts until end of combat.[br/]Absorb Pain cannot target Mechanical units, Colony Defenses or other units with Absorb Pain.
该单位将自身与目标友方单位相连，连接单位受到的所有伤害减少{absorbPainDamageReduction}并转由该单位承担，效果持续至战斗结束。[br/]吸收痛苦不能以机械单位、殖民地防御或其他拥有吸收痛苦的单位为目标。
This unit is linked to a friendly unit. Any damage dealt to the linked unit is reduced by {absorbPainDamageReduction} and is dealt to this unit instead. This effect lasts until end of combat.
该单位正与一个友方单位相连，连接单位受到的所有伤害减少 {absorbPainDamageReduction} 并转由该单位承担，效果持续至战斗结束。
This unit is linked to a friendly unit. Any damage dealt to this unit is reduced by {absorbPainDamageReduction} and is dealt to the linked unit instead. This effect lasts until end of combat.
该单位正与一个友方单位相连，受到的所有伤害减少 {absorbPainDamageReduction} 并转移给连接单位，效果持续至战斗结束。
Severs the connection made by Absorb Pain.
断开由“吸收痛苦”建立的连接。

The Deep One weaves images of drowning and the feeling of suffocation which ripple through the target's mind. The call ripples at the end of the affected unit's turn, causing the damage to echo to nearby units, as well as giving them this effect.
深渊古兽编织出的溺水图景和窒息之感在目标的脑海中起伏，直到受影响单位的回合结束。随后，呼唤将在附近单位间回响并造成伤害，使附近单位也会受到此效果影响。
The unit is resonating with the call of the Deep One and at the end of its turn will echo the call, damaging all adjacent units and spreading the Echo of the Deep.
该单位正与深渊古兽的呼唤产生共鸣，在该单位回合结束时，深渊的呼唤将会回响，对所有相邻单位造成伤害并传播深渊回响。
Launch a shockwave of Psionic energy that crashes into the target enemy unit.
发射一道灵能能量冲击波撞向目标敌方单位。
Fire PsiTec Blasters at the target.
使用灵能科技爆能枪攻击目标。
Fire the PsiTec Cannon at the target. This attack does not suffer from melee engagement penalties.
使用灵能科技炮攻击目标，此攻击不会受到近战交战的惩罚。
Release a Psionic blast in a cone towards the target direction.
向目标方向扇形区域释放灵能冲击波。
Fire PsiTec Heavy Repeaters at the target.
使用灵能科技重型连发枪攻击目标。
Point the tip of a staff at the target enemy to fire blasts of Psionic energy.
将法杖顶端指向目标敌人，发射灵能冲击波。
Crush an opponent with Psionic Gauntlets
使用灵能臂铠碾碎敌人。
Throw a Psionic-charged grenade that deals damage in an area.
投掷一个灵能充能手雷，造成范围伤害。
Fire a PsiTec Cannon at the target. This attack does not suffer the accuracy penalty for targeting Flying units.
使用灵能科技海军加农炮攻击目标，此攻击以飞行单位为目标时不会受到准度惩罚。
Produce a mass illusion field that destroys the targets' minds and subjects them to hallucinations.
制造一股大规模幻觉力场，摧毁目标心智并使他们沉浸在幻觉之中。
Fire a PsiTec Emmiter, dealing damage in a 3 hex line.
发射灵能科技发射器，对排成直线的 3 个单元格造成伤害。
Heal unit when attacking non-Mindless targets.
攻击非无意识目标时能够治疗单位。
Deals Psionic damage to a single target.
对单个目标造成灵能伤害。

In the text below, any inserted strings - anything of the form {text} - is replaced by an integer value for the thing described in the brackets. If the {text} is not followed by a unit - e.g. shields, hitpoints - the icon for the unit is inserted together with the integer. The same holds for symbols - e.g. '+', '%' - which are occasionally inserted together with the integer.
For references to game terminology and in-world references, please check the glossary delivered as part of the documentation.
